about_the_game:
How long will you survive in a sea full of bloodthirsty sharks? Will you capture a Spinosaurus and fend off the tentacles of the Kraken? Or perhaps you dream of a Megalodon tooth? Don't look for it in a museum, snatch it from the jaws yourself!

A STORY OF SIRENS


The game concept is based on a theory in which the evolution of humanity was at some point diverged. The complex organism that chose to leave the ocean and conquer the lands was divided. Part of the species decided to stay in the water and evolve there. Perfecting their physical bodies, these beings began to exhibit more and more traits typical of marine creatures, giving rise to humanoid mermaids who never experienced life on land, evolving underwater.

UNDERWATER EVOLUTION


Similar to humans on the surface, mermaids also dominated their environment, becoming the dominant species, free from diseases and wars. As long-lived beings, mermaids became increasingly perfect, more intelligent, and adept at hunting. Hiding from homo sapiens, concealing themselves in the depths of the ocean, in underwater caves, mermaids observe humanity, understanding that sooner or later, a confrontation will arise to determine the dominant species.



FROM PREHISTORY TO THE PRESENT



Experience a fascinating journey through the world from the perspective of mermaids at different stages of their evolution. Feel the terror of the prehistoric world, the times of great floods, battling real and mythical creatures. Uncover the secrets hidden at the bottom of oceanic depths!



GAMEPLAY



As a mermaid, venture into the dangerous waters of seas and oceans to assert your dominance. Survive attacks from smaller creatures and fight powerful bosses, constantly improving your performance.

MAIN HUB



Your trophies and found treasures will be used to modify your cave. Decorate, customize, and tailor the visual aspect of the Main Hub to match your style. Let the mermaid feel comfortable in her cave.

Unlock new skins for your mermaid, admiring how her appearance and abilities change over millions of years of evolution.



ARENA BATTLES



Face endless waves of enemies and survive as long as possible in arenas. Discover their history and treasures buried in the rubble.

MAIN FEATURES



- Exploration of sea and ocean waters
- Survival mode
- Main Hub customization
- Mermaid customization
- Combat using melee weapons
- Boss battles

name: Sirens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: system requirements may change during development of the game.

short_description: Become a deadly Siren and hunt down the most dangerous sea creatures that have ever swum in the depths of the oceans! Experience a fascinating journey through the world as seen from the perspective of Sirens at various stages of their evolution.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish
*languages with full audio support
